verses.verse: If <S%G1437><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> with the tongues <S%G1100><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of angels <S%G32><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> love <S%G26><s%>, I am become <S%G1096><s%> sounding <S%G2278><s%> brass <S%G5475><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> a clanging <S%G214><s%> cymbal <S%G2950><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> the gift of prophecy <S%G4394><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> mysteries <S%G3466><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, so as <S%G5620><s%> to remove <S%G3179><s%> mountains <S%G3735><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> love <S%G26><s%>, I am <S%G1510><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I bestow <S%G5595><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> goods <S%G5224><s%> to feed <S%G5595><s%> the poor <S%G2532><s%>, and if <S%G1437><s%> I give <S%G3860><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> be burned <S%G2545><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> love <S%G26><s%>, it profiteth <S%G5623><s%> me nothing <S%G3762><s%>.

Love <S%G26><s%> suffereth long <S%G3114><s%>, and is kind <S%G5541><s%>; love <S%G26><s%> envieth <S%G2206><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>; love <S%G26><s%> vaunteth <S%G4068><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> itself <S%G4068><s%>, is <S%G5448><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> puffed up <S%G5448><s%>,

doth not <S%G3756><s%> behave itself <S%G807><s%> unseemly <S%G807><s%>, seeketh <S%G2212><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> its own <S%G1438><s%>, is <S%G3947><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> provoked <S%G3947><s%>, taketh not <S%G3756><s%> account <S%G3049><s%> of evil <S%G2556><s%>;
rejoiceth <S%G5463><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> rejoiceth <S%G4796><s%> with the truth <S%G225><s%>;
beareth <S%G4722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, believeth <S%G4100><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, hopeth <S%G1679><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, endureth <S%G5278><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.

Love <S%G26><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> faileth <S%G1601><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> there be prophecies <S%G4394><s%>, they shall be done away <S%G2673><s%>; whether <S%G1535><s%> there be tongues <S%G1100><s%>, they shall cease <S%G3973><s%>; whether <S%G1535><s%> there be knowledge <S%G1108><s%>, it shall be done away <S%G2673><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part <S%G3313><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> we prophesy <S%G4395><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part <S%G3313><s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%>, that <S%G5119><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> shall be done away <S%G2673><s%>.

When <S%G3753><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> a child <S%G3516><s%>, I spake <S%G2980><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a child <S%G3516><s%>, I felt <S%G5426><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a child <S%G3516><s%>, I thought <S%G3049><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a child <S%G3516><s%>: now <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G3753><s%> I am become <S%G1096><s%> a man <S%G435><s%>, I have put away <S%G2673><s%> childish <S%G3516><s%> things <S%G3588><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> now <S%G737><s%> we see <S%G991><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> a mirror <S%G1722><s%>, darkly <S%G135><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>: now <S%G737><s%> I know <S%G1097><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part <S%G3313><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall I know <S%G1921><s%> fully even as <S%G2531><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I was fully known <S%G1921><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, hope <S%G1680><s%>, love <S%G26><s%>, these <S%G5023><s%> three <S%G5140><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> the greatest <S%G3187><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> is love <S%G26><s%>.
